appName.description: Easy submit your tickets to Mantis

appDescription.message: Easy submit your tickets to Mantis
appDescription.description: Easy submit your tickets to Mantis

toolOff.description: The title of the icon in the browser when the tool is on.

toolOn.description: The title of the icon in the browser when the tool is off.

loadingText.description: Loading text for the app in the commentBox

commentBoxErrorText.message: Please add a comment to your ticket.
commentBoxErrorText.description: This is the warning when you submit a ticket without a description.

commentBoxPrioCheckboxTitle.description: The priority button in the commentbox

commentBoxStatusTitle.message: The status of the ticket is '$STATUS$'
commentBoxStatusTitle.description: This will be the title of the status in the commentBox

commentBoxBugtrackerTitle.message: Go to this ticket in your bug tracker $1
commentBoxBugtrackerTitle.description: The title form the to bug tracker text

commentBoxAboutBrugtrackerTitle.message: The browser that was used for this ticket was $BROWSER$
commentBoxAboutBrugtrackerTitle.description: The title from the browser icon

commentBoxResize.message: Click to resize your browser to this resolution
commentBoxResize.description: The title from the browser resolution in the commentbox.

addFile.description: The title of the add file button.

fileItemTitle.description: The title of the delete item

fileItemFallbackName.description: The fall-back name of a unnamed item

inputTextError.description: The error that will be showed when the input is wrong.

selectorScreenshotName.description: The name of the screenshot that will be saved.

selectorScreenshotNameAfter.description: The name of the screenshot that will be saved. (after selecting)

selectorLoadingText.description: The text that will be showed when the ticket is uploading.

selectorHelper.message: Draw a box to select an issue. (Press ESC to cancel)

setupExistingProject.description: The option that the user will see to add the website to a existing project.

setupMissingFieldsError.message: Not all the fields are filled.
setupMissingFieldsError.description: This error will be showed if the user submit the form when not all fields are filed in.

setupLogginText.message: Checking your credentials, and logging in at $TOOLNAME$.
setupLogginText.description: This is the loading text when logging in.

setupMissingBugtracker.description: Shown when no bug tracker is selected

setupStepOneBody.message: This is the first time that you open Layer Notes on this website. Please connect this site to a bug tracker. Or add it to a existing project.
setupStepOneBody.description: The body of the first step

setupStepTwoBody.message: Please fill in your bug tracker credentials, so Layer Notes can connect with your account.
setupStepTwoBody.description: The body of the second step.

setupStepTwoTitle.description: The title of the second step.

setupHelperTextUrl.message: This is the URL witch you use to access your bug tracker
setupHelperTextUrl.description: The helper text of the URL.

setupHelperTextUserName.message: This is the user name you use to login in your bug tracker
setupHelperTextUserName.description: The helper text of the user name

setupHelperTextPassword.message: This is the password you use to login in your bug tracker
setupHelperTextPassword.description: The helper text of the password

setupStepTreeBody.message: Choose the project that this website belongs to.

setupStepDoneTitle.description: The title of the done screen.

setupStepDoneBody.message: When this is your first time you can start a tutorial.

setupStartTutorial.description: The call to action to start the tutorial.

ticketsOnPageUpdating.message: Updating your ticket in the bug tracker...

toolBarNewNoteText.description: The text of the new note button in the toolbar.

toolBarNewNoteTitle.description: The title of the new note button in the toolbar.

toolBarSettingsText.description: The text of the settings button in the toolbar.

toolBarSettingsTitle.description: The title of the settings button in the toolbar.

toolBarAmoutTicketsTitle.message: Amount tickets on this page, and the total tickets on this site.

userTourStepOneTitle.description: The h1 from the user tour.

userTourStepOneBody.message: This tutorial will explain how this tool works.
userTourStepOneBody.description: The body of the first step in the user tour.

userTourStepTwoTitle.description: The h1 of the second step in the user tour.

userTourStepTwoBody.message: This is the sidebar of the app. With the 'New Item' button you can create a new note. Press on 'Next', to create a new note.
userTourStepTwoBody.description: The body of the second step in the user tour.

userTourStepTreeTitle.description: The h1 of the third step of the user tour.

userTourStepTreeBody.message: Now select the area of your note, and add a comment. When you submit a note, there is a screenshot automatically added.
userTourStepTreeBody.description: The body of the third step of the user tour.

userTourStepFourTitle.description: The h1 of the last step of the user tour.

userTourStepFourBody.message: You have created your first note! Click on the icon to view your note. You now know how to create a note. Happy testing!
userTourStepFourBody.description: The body of the last step of the user tour.
